ValidationRule.description: If Sales Channel value is 202-Take the Lead, then TTL# is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Channel__c , '202 - Take the Lead'), ISBLANK( TTL__c), OR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2017-10-11"), ISNEW()))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Sales Channel value is 202-Take the Lead, then TTL# is required
